When this creature transforms into Shiva, Light's Destruction, you gain life equal to the amount of damage dealt to your opponents this turn.
First strike, haste
[i]Sol Edge[/i] – Whenever Shiva deals combat damage to a player, you gain that much life, then you draw a card. The next time a creature dealing combat damage to a player this turn would trigger, it triggers an additional time.
